Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations

Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.formats.mpo

package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.formats.mpo
Mammalian Phenotype Ontology (MPO)--specific implementations of Ontology and related classes.

The classes from this package facilitate working with the MPO by specialized types with attributes relevant when working with the MPO, the official MPO annotation formats as well as various shortcuts and utilities.

Author:
Manuel Holtgrewe, Sebastian Koehler

  • Class
    Description
    MpAllelicComposition
    This class represents the Allelic Composition field of the MGI_GenePheno.rpt and MGI_PhenoGenoMP.rpt file as a string (without breaking down its subparts).
    MpAnnotation
    A class that encapsulates the annotation of a MGI model with MP terms, including PubMed references modifiers, and negation options.
    MpAnnotation.Builder
     
    MpGeneModel
     
    MpGeneticMarker
    A MpGene object corresponds to a genetic marker in MGI.
    MpMarkerType
     
    MpModel
    This class is the abstract superclass of MpSimpleModel (for mouse models from MGI) and MpGeneModel (summary of phenotypes at the gene level for one or more mouse models).
    MpModifier
     
    MpModifierType
    Modifiers used in Mammalian Phenotype Ontology (MP) annotations.
    MpoGeneAnnotation
    Annotation of a HPO term (via its TermId) with genes.
    MpSex
     
    MpSimpleModel
     
    MpStrain
    This class represents the Genetic Background field of the MGI_PhenoGenoMP.rpt file as a string (without breaking down its subparts).
